desc: Retail store featuring US flags, Military and decorative flags, State, Indoor and International Flags. Distributor of commercial and residential flagpole sales, service and installation to the WNY area. Custom Flags, retractable banners, street pole banners, interior and exterior signage and vinyl wraps.

layout.text: Discount automatically applied at check out! No returns accepted on clearance items. Must add all items to cart to get discount.
